feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.33.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

ðŸ›  Fixes:

  • App imports from hight versions to lower should throw error by @kriks7iitk in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8922
  • Copy writing improvements by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9075
  • Drag and drop functionality for bulk user upload fix by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9143
  • Fix toggles on workspace login page by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.33.2...v2.33.3

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.33.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix: On cloning apps should not transform the data or do backward compatibility as cloning is only possible from the same tj version by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9154

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.33.3...v2.33.4

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.33.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.33.4...v2.33.5

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.33.6
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.33.5...v2.33.6
